name: The Most Random Battle...
description:
The most random battle is a game made for the 2022 GMTK game jam. When moving around, the player can only choose a direction and leave the number of tiles moved up to the roll of the dice. Can you beat the 9 other challengers and win the most random battle?

Just a heads up, after testing on the web in itch, I found a small glitch. If you return to the home screen, the battle button doesn't  work. To get around this just refresh the page :)
